field.label: Argument
field.hint: Please write a few notes describing why you do not want to publish your item
field.required: You must enter an argument for not publishing your document

field.label: Embargo period
field.hint: You have stated that your thesis may be made openly available in Munin at a later date. Please specify how long we should wait before we make the thesis available. While stating how long you wish to wait, you may at any time alter the length of this period in either direction. If so, please contact your institute or faculty on this.

field.label: Explanation
field.hint: You may specify or the embargo period more closely here, if you wish:

field.label: Author
field.hint: For technical reasons the author name in this field must be identical to the author name as written on the front page of the thesis. If this is not the case, you should edit the name here.
field.required: You must enter the name of the author

field.label: Title
field.hint: The title of the thesis
field.required: You must enter the title of the thesis

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Approximately 200 words

field.label: Supervisor
field.hint: Supervisor's name

field.label: Supervisor's e-mail address
field.hint: Is needed to notify your supervisor of your submission. The address is not saved.

field.label: Subject categories/- keywords
field.hint: First, choose an appropriate subject from the list of "Subject Categories". More than one subject and/or relevant subject keywords of your own choice, may be added by choosing the button "Add more". Enter one keyword (single word or expression) per field.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Number of print copies
field.hint: Printing: Some faculties/departments offer to make print copies of your thesis for you. Check with your faculty/department whether they offer a print service and indicate the number of print copies you want. If printing is not offered this field is not applicable to you.

field.label: Colour print these pages
field.hint: Please indicate here which pages should be colour printed. Note: Please refer to the page count of the pdf-file – not the page numbering used in your thesis. If you have more than one file, please specify which file you refer to. Click "Add more" if more than one file contains coloured pages. If you leave this field blank, all pages will be printed in black and white.

field.label: Messages
field.hint: Other messages for the administration at your faculty or department.

field.label: ePhorte saksnummer
field.hint: Administrator kan her legge inn henvisning til administrative saker som har relevans for oppgaven.

field.label: Unntatt offentlighet etter formelt vedtak
field.hint: Angi her om oppgaven er unntatt offentlighet, både i elektronisk format og papirformat, etter formelt vedtak. (Angi i så fall arkivreferanse.)

field.label: Unntatt offentlighet opphører
field.hint: Fyll ut dersom oppgaven er unntatt offentlighet, både i elektronisk format og papirformat, etter formelt vedtak

field.label: Innlevering OK
field.hint: Er innleveringen OK? Sjekk at rett PDF er levert, at den kan åpnes og at oppgaven er levert med rett emnekode.

field.label: Trykking
field.hint: Trykkestatus

field.label: Sendt til bedømmelse
field.hint: Status bedømmelsesprosess

field.label: Godkjent eller ikke godkjent
field.hint: Er oppgaven bestått eller ikke, eller er den av andre grunner ikke godkjent

field.label: Gjøres tilgjengelig i Munin
field.hint: Fakultetets konklusjon med hensyn til om oppgaven skal gjøres tilgjengelig nå, senere eller aldri. Dette vurderes ut fra informasjon gitt av studenten, innspill fra veileder(e) og hvorvidt oppgaven har blitt vurdert til ståkarakter/bestått. Oppgaver hvor verdien er satt til "Nå" vil automatisk bli gjort tilgjengelig i Munin når de er ferdigbehandlet.

field.label: Administrasjonens kommentarer
field.hint: Annen informasjon om oppgaven, tilgjengeliggjøring m.v. - kan også brukes til notater under behandlingen av oppgaven.

field.hint: Please write a few notes describing why you do not want to publish your item

field.label: Trykking
field.hint: Trykkestatus

field.label: Sendt til bedømmelse
field.hint: Status bedømmelsesprosess

field.label: Godkjent eller ikke godkjent
field.hint: Er oppgaven bestått eller ikke, eller er den av andre grunner ikke godkjent

field.label: Gjøres tilgjengelig i Munin
field.hint: Fakultetets konklusjon med hensyn til om oppgaven skal gjøres tilgjengelig nå, senere eller aldri. Dette vurderes ut fra informasjon gitt av studenten, innspill fra veileder(e) og hvorvidt oppgaven har blitt vurdert til ståkarakter/bestått. Oppgaver hvor verdien er satt til "Nå" vil automatisk bli gjort tilgjengelig i Munin når de er ferdigbehandlet.

field.label: Administrasjonens kommentarer
field.hint: Annen informasjon om oppgaven, tilgjengeliggjøring m.v. - kan også brukes til notater under behandlingen av oppgaven.

field.label: On availability in Munin
field.hint: You may choose to postpone for a period making your thesis openly available in Munin. Please describe here if you want your thesis temporarily not to be available in Munin.

field.label: Name of candidate
field.hint: For technical reasons the name in this field must be identical to the name as written on the front page of the thesis. If this is not the case, you should edit the name here.
field.required: You must enter the name of the author

field.label: Contact information
field.hint: How you may be contacted (postal address, phone number, and e-mail)

field.label: Type of degree
field.required: You must choose one of the degree types.

field.label: Title
field.required: You must enter the title of the thesis

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Please enter a short abstract of your thesis, with a length of approx. 200-300 words, in the language of your choice. You may enter abstracts in two or more languages, by clicking "Add More".

field.label: Popularized summary
field.hint: Enter a short abstract for the public, preferably in English. The text will be included in the University’s annual doctoral booklet, in the public announcement of the thesis and as a press release. Explain your project (including methods) and describe the potential for impact. Avoid jargon and try to make your work interesting and comprehensible for a general public. Max 1000 characters incl spaces.

field.label: Monograph or a collection of articles (or other type)?
field.hint: Please indicate if the thesis is one single monograph, consists of a number of articles, or has other parts.

field.label: Research data set(s) used in your thesis
field.hint: Enter reference to research data set(s) used in your thesis. If you have used more than one data set, please click the ‘Add More’-button.

field.label: Approved instruction component
field.hint: Please enter the archive reference number for the approval of your instruction component, or alternatively the date of the approval or the date of the letter you received.

field.label: Main supervisor's e-mail address
field.hint: Is used only to notify your supervisor of your submission. The address will not be saved in Munin.

field.label: Subject categories/- keywords
field.hint: First, choose an appropriate subject from the list of "Subject Categories". More than one subject and/or relevant subject keywords of your own choice, may be added by choosing the button "Add more". Enter one keyword (single word or expression) per field.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Financing
field.hint: Here you may list financial sources you wish to credit

field.label: Messages
field.hint: Here you may give any kind of message to the administration at your faculty

field.label: ePhorte saksnummer
field.hint: Administrator kan her legge inn henvisning til administrative saker som har relevans for avhandlingen.

field.label: Innlevering OK
field.hint: Er innleveringen OK? Sjekk at rette filer er levert, at de kan åpnes og at avhandlingen er levert til rett fakultet.

field.label: Date of defence
field.hint: Please enter the defence date, if known - may be provisional date

field.label: Trykking komité
field.hint: Status for trykking av avhandling som skal til bedømmelseskomiteen

field.label: Trykking disputas
field.hint: Status for trykking av avhandling til disputas

field.label: Administrasjonens kommentarer
field.hint: Annen informasjon om oppgaven, tilgjengeliggjøring m.v. - kan også brukes til notater under behandlingen av oppgaven.

pair.displayed-value: I hereby confirm that all co-authors of articles or parts that may be made publicly available, have consented to this

I have not (yet) received consent from all my co-authors to make the applicable articles or parts publicly available in Munin. (Please specify below what remains, and if you expect to obtain the consent from those remaining.)
Please wait 1 year past my submission before my thesis is made freely available in Munin
Please wait 2 year past my submission before my thesis is made freely available in Munin
Please wait 3 year past my submission before my thesis is made freely available in Munin
Please wait 4 year past my submission before my thesis is made freely available in Munin
Please wait 5 year past my submission before my thesis is made freely available in Munin
